summary: Verified both bug fixes: 1) Search results images now fill 100% container width using native HTML img tags with objectFit:cover, 2) Location picker regions are now clickable after overflow:hidden fix
context_for_next_testing_agent: Both bug fixes verified working. Image sizing fix in search.tsx (lines 936-959) and location picker fix in LocationPicker.tsx (lines 507-560) are functioning correctly.
tests_passed: Search results images fill 100% container width (291px x 180px matching parent)
Images use native HTML img tag with inline styles: width:100%, height:100%, objectFit:cover, display:block
Location picker modal opens when clicking 'All Locations' button
Location picker shows 'Search for a location...' trigger which opens region selection
Clicking on 'Dar es Salaam' region successfully selects it
Selected location 'Dar es Salaam' is displayed in the header after selection
Location picker modal closes automatically after region selection
Search results text updates to show location filter: '5 results for phone in Dar es Salaam'

image_sizing_fix.fix_description: Using native HTML tags with inline styles (width:100%, height:100%, objectFit:cover) instead of React Native Image component
image_sizing_fix.evidence: All 5 listing images measured at 291px x 180px, filling their 291px x 180px containers completely. objectFit property confirmed as 'cover'

location_picker_regions_clickable.fix_description: Added overflow:hidden to parent div to clip overflowing child elements that were causing click interception
location_picker_regions_clickable.evidence: Successfully clicked on 'Search for a location...' to open region list, then clicked on 'Dar es Salaam' which was selected and displayed in header

test_flow_executed: Step 2: Verified 5 listing images with correct dimensions and objectFit:cover
Step 3: Clicked 'All Locations' button - modal opened
Step 4: Clicked 'Search for a location...' - regions list displayed (Arusha, Dar es Salaam, Dodoma, Mbeya, Mwanza)
Step 5: Clicked 'Dar es Salaam' - region selected successfully
Step 6: Modal closed and header showed 'Dar es Salaam' location
Step 7: Search results text confirmed: '5 results for phone in Dar es Salaam'
